<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="catalog3">de9fed0983fdea1034af11b6feaad3f6</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Generate PDF</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    var btn = document.createElement("button");
    btn.innerHTML = "我的按钮";
    btn.className = "btn btn-default";
    btn.onclick = function() {
        // 按钮点击逻辑
        alert("按钮被点击!");
    };

    // 将按钮添加到特定元素
    var container = document.getElementById("some_element_id");
    if (container) {
        container.appendChild(btn);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-27 07:39:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b7a3758983fdea1034af11b6feaad30e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate PDF</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Demo3" source="x_1755581_demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b7a3758983fdea1034af11b6feaad30e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-27 07:39:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
